item.title: Hi-Fi Rush - Release Trailer
item.description: Bethesda and Tango Gameworks' Hi-Fi Rush was a surprise success when it shadow dropped in January 2023 with its brand of rhythm-based action.

item.title: Zenless Zone Zero: All Ascension Materials (& How to Get Them)
item.description:
Ascension is key to advancing Zenless Zone Zero ’s campaign and game modes. Ascending a character or equipment raises its level cap by ten to twenty points, which is vital for strengthening your squad members and weapons. This guide explores Ascension in Zenless Zone Zero and explains how to quickly and easily obtain all the materials needed for this process.

What Are Ascension Materials in Zenless Zone Zero?

Ascension Materials are level-cap breakers in Zenless Zone Zero . When you upgrade an Agent, W-Engine, or Bangboo by ten levels, you hit a cap that stops further progress. To surpass this limit, you need specific Ascension Materials. The quantity and type of these items vary as you continue to level up your characters and equipment.

All Agent Ascension Materials

There are 15 Agent Ascension Materials based on five Specialties, with three materials for each. Most of these can be obtained through the Combat Simulation’s Agent Promotion mode. You can also craft them using basic materials or earn them by dismantling unwanted items.

Agent Ascension Item

Beneficiary Agents

Effect

Basic Offense Certification Seal

Corin Wickes, Billy Kid, Nekomiya Mana, Soldier 11, Ellen Joe, Anton Ivanov

Increases the level cap for offense-specialty Agents to 20.

Advanced Offense Certification Seal

Corin Wickes, Billy Kid, Nekomiya Mana, Soldier 11, Ellen Joe, Anton Ivanov

Increases the level cap for offense-specialty Agents to 40.

Pioneer’s Certification Seal

Corin Wickes, Billy Kid, Nekomiya Mana, Soldier 11, Ellen Joe, Anton Ivanov

Increases the level cap for offense-specialty Agents to 60.

Basic Stun Certification Seal

Anby Demara, Koleda Belobog, Von Lycaon

Increases the level cap for stun-specialty Agents to 20.

Advanced Stun Certification Seal

Anby Demara, Koleda Belobog, Von Lycaon

Increases the level cap for stun-specialty Agents to 40.

Buster Certification Seal

Anby Demara, Koleda Belobog, Von Lycaon

Increases the level cap for stun-specialty Agents to 60.

Basic Anomaly Certification Seal

Grace, Howard, Piper Wheel

Increases the level cap for anomaly-specialty Agents to 20.

Advanced Anomaly Certification Seal

Grace, Howard, Piper Wheel

Increases the level cap for anomaly-specialty Agents to 40.

Controller Certification Seal

Grace, Howard, Piper Wheel

Increases the level cap for anomaly-specialty Agents to 60.

Basic Support Certification Seal

Nicole Demara, Soukaku, Alexandrina Sebastiane, Luciana de Montefio,

Increases the level cap for support-specialty Agents to 20.

Advanced Support Certification Seal

Nicole Demara, Soukaku, Alexandrina Sebastiane, Luciana de Montefio,

Increases the level cap for support-specialty Agents to 40.

Ruler Certification Seal

Nicole Demara, Soukaku, Alexandrina Sebastiane, Luciana de Montefio,

Increases the level cap for support-specialty Agents to 60.

Basic Defense Certification Seal

Ben Bigger

Increases the level cap for defense-specialty Agents to 20.

Advanced Defense Certification Seal

Ben Bigger

Increases the level cap for defense-specialty Agents to 40.

Defender Certification Seal

Ben Bigger

Increases the level cap for defense-specialty Agents to 60.

All W-Engine Ascension Materials

Like Agents’ Ascension Materials, W-Engine Ascension items are categorized by their Specialty Model. You can obtain these level-cap items by participating in the W-Engine Modification mode of the Combat Simulation. Additionally, you can salvage them from unused components.

W-Engine Ascension Item

Beneficiary Device(s)

Effect

Attack Component

Deep Sea Visitor, Riot Suppressor Mark VI, Steel Cushion, The Brimstone, Cannon Rotor, Drill Rig - Red Axis, Housekeeper, Starlight Engine, Starlight Engine Replica, Street Superstar, [Lunar] Decrescent, [Lunar] Noviluna, [Lunar] Pleniluna.

Increases the attack model W-Engine’s level-cap to 20

Reinforced Attack Component

(Same as above)

Increases the attack model W-Engine’s level-cap to 40

Specialized Attack Component

(Same as above)

Increases the attack model W-Engine’s level-cap to 60

Stun Component

[Vortex] Revolver, [Vortex] Hatchet, [Vortex] Arrow, Steam Oven, Six Shooter, Precious Fossilized Core, Demara Battery Mark II, The Restrained, Hellfire Gears

Increases the stun model W-Engine’s level-cap to 20

Reinforced Stun Component

(Same as above)

Increases the stun model W-Engine’s level-cap to 40

Specialized Stun Component

(Same as above)

Increases the stun model W-Engine’s level-cap to 60

Anomaly Component

Fusion Compiler, Electro-Lip Gloss, Rainforest Gourmet, Roaring Ride, Weeping Gemini, [Magnetic Storm] Bravo, [Magnetic Storm] Alpha, [Magnetic Storm] Charlie

Increases the anomaly model W-Engine’s level-cap to 20

Reinforced Anomaly Component

(Same as above)

Increases the anomaly model W-Engine’s level-cap to 40

Specialized Anomaly Component

(Same as above)

Increases the anomaly model W-Engine’s level-cap to 60

Support Component

Reverb series, Unfettered Game Ball, The Vault, Slice of Time, Kaboom the Cannon, Bashful Demon, Weeping Cradle

Increases the support model W-Engine’s level-cap to 20

Reinforced Support Component

(Same as above)

Increases the support model W-Engine’s level-cap to 40

Specialized Support Component

(Same as above)

Increases the support model W-Engine’s level-cap to 60

Defense Component

Big Cylinder, Bunny Band, Original Transmorpher, Spring Embrace, Identity series

Increases the defense model W-Engine’s level-cap to 20

Reinforced Defense Component

(Same as above)

Increases the defense model W-Engine’s level-cap to 40

Specialized Defense Component

(Same as above)

Increases the defense model W-Engine’s level-cap to 60

All Bangboo Ascension Materials

All Bangboos benefit from the same three Ascension Materials: Ether Electrolyte, Energy Transfer Fluid, and Concentrated Cooling Fluid. You can obtain these items by shopping at the Convenience Store, dismantling components, or investigating Hollow Zero.

Bangboo Ascension Item

Effect

Ether Electrolyte

Increases a Bangboo’s level-cap to 20

Energy Transfer Fluid

Increases a Bangboo’s level-cap to 40

Concentrated Cooling Fluid

Increases a Bangboo’s level-cap to 60

Ether Electrolyte and Ether Battery are two different items. The former is used for level-cap boost, while the latter gives you Battery Charge points.

item.title: Elden Ring: Shadow of the Erdtree - How To Get Ash of War: Savage Lion's Claw (& What It Does)
item.description:
Similar to the countless weapons and items in the game, Elden Ring also includes Ash of Wars, which can be slotted into most weapons, granting them an additional unique skill. This guide includes information on the new Ash of War: Savage Lion's Claw and how players can locate it fairly early in the game.

Updated July 10, 2024, by Waseem Muhammad : As more time passes on the launch of Shadow of the Erdtree, more secrets tend to unfold. The DLC has a lot of new Talismans and weapons that players can test out and create a build around them. Not all of these items are easy to acquire, as some require the player to face challenging bosses or clear caves beforehand. This update will focus on the Savage Lion's Claw Ash of War with added context on which weapons are suited for it and how players can maximize the total damage output.

Ash of War: Savage Lion's Claw Overview: Effects, & Skill

This Ash of War grants an armament the Heavy affinity. Usable on swords, axes, and hammers (small armaments and thrusting swords excepted).

In Elden Ring: Shadow of the Erdtree , Ash of War: Savage Lion's Claw is a new Ash of War. Performing the Ash of War allows the player to flip over and deal decent damage to enemies, possibly staggering most enemies. The Ash of War: Savage Lion's Claw's attack power can increase by 15% when used with the Shard of Alexander equipped.

Freyja's Greatsword is one of the best weapons to use this Ash of War on. This is because this Ash of War is a Redmane Skill, and Freyja's Greatsword enhances the damage of these skills by 10%. The flipping animation can sometimes be pretty slow, making it harder to hit enemies or bosses with high mobility. For Elden Ring players who want to further increase the damage of this Ash of War can equip the Ritual Sword Talisman , which increases attack power by 10% when health is full.

This Ash of War is great for inflicting status effects such as Bleed or Frostbite if the affinity on the weapon is changed. If you plan on going for the Blood Affinity, you can equip White Mask and Lord of Blood's Exultation , which will increase your attack power whenever there is Blood Loss in the vicinity. The following are honorable mentions for weapons if you are not keen on using Freyja's Greatsword:

  • Bloodfiend's Arm
  • Giant-Crusher
  • Smithscript Greathammer
  • Great Katana

Ash of War Skill Description

The Savage Lion's Claw Ash of War costs 20 FP to cast and can be chained into a follow-up attack. This follow-up attack costs 10 FP.

Skill of the particularly brave, even among the Redmanes. Somersault forwards, striking foes with armament. An additional strike may be performed with an additional input.

Where To Find Ash of War: Savage Lion's Claw Location

To get the Ash of War: Savage Lion's Claw in Shadow of the Erdtree , you must first reach the Three-Path Cross Site of Grace, located northwest of Scorched Ruins. You will know you are in the right spot when you can see and talk to the NPCs Hornsent and Freyja next to the Grace.

From here, summon your Torrent and start heading further northwest, hugging the left wall of the mountain. Soon, you will come across a small camp with the Ash of War: Savage Lion's Claw lying in the middle near the fireplace.

item.title: Monopoly GO: How to Get Free Ice Cream Tokens For Ice Cream Partners
item.description:
Quick Links

  • How To Get More Ice Creams For Ice Cream Partners In Monopoly GO
  • Are There Free Ice Cream Links For Ice Cream Partners Monopoly GO?

Events are a massive part of Monopoly GO's gameplay. Scopely regularly launches new events to keep the game exciting for players. The game just received its first Partner Event for July: Ice Cream Partners. This fun-filled event has tons of sweet rewards for tycoons, including the top prize of 5,000 free dice rolls, a five-star sticker pack, and the Ice Cream Truck token.

All Partner Events in Monopoly GO have an event-exclusive token, and the Ice Cream Partners is no different. This time around, we have the Ice Cream token, which players need to spin the Partner wheel. To complete the Ice Cream Partners event and claim the top prize, players will need a lot of these tokens. Luckily, there are multiple sources to get them. In this guide, we will go over some easy ways to get free Ice Cream tokens for the Ice Cream Partners event in Monopoly GO .

How To Get More Ice Creams For Ice Cream Partners In Monopoly GO

Quick Wins

Quick Wins are simple tasks that reset daily and give you valuable rewards upon completion, including a handful of Ice Cream tokens. These tasks are very simple like landing on the Chance tile three times, rolling the dice five times, or upgrading a landmark. So remember to finish your quick wins tasks daily to get a steady supply of these tokens.

Event and Tournament Milestones

Monopoly GO regularly introduces new events every few days that bring tons of goodies. As you reach an event milestone, you unlock its reward. Currently, the game is hosting the Vacation Voyage event. It will last for three days until July 13 and requires you to hit the Tax, Utility, and Chance squares.

Here are all the Vacation Voyage milestones that contain Ice Cream tokens:

Vacation Voyage Milestones

Points Required

Rewards

1

Five

100 Ice Cream Tokens

7

35

120 Ice Cream Tokens

9

35

160 Ice Cream Tokens

11

45

250 Ice Cream Tokens

14

60

270 Ice Cream Tokens

17

75

21

400 Ice Cream Tokens

25

450 Ice Cream Tokens

28

400

31

750

600 Ice Cream Tokens

34

700 Ice Cream Tokens

900 Ice Cream Tokens

42

1,500

1,000 Ice Cream Tokens

Board Tiles

Lastly, you can also land on tiles with Ice Creams to collect these tokens. During the event, you will find various Ice Cream tiles on your board, and landing on them will earn you these tokens.

Are There Free Ice Cream Links For Ice Cream Partners Monopoly GO?

Currently, there are no active links for Ice Cream tokens in Monopoly GO . If we find any links later on, we'll update this article, so check back later for updates.
